channel.title: Error Connecting to Server
channel.description:
Hey Guys,
I am posting this in Server Help and Client Help, because I'm not really sure where the issue is occurring.
It seems obvious to me it's more likely to be client.
The issue occurring is:
Some players of the server can connect, but others simply receive the message "Error Connecting to Server", which is really odd.
Anyone who can help me out I appreciate.

item.title: Error Connecting to Server
item.dc:creator: @Mikeyzzz Mikeyzzz
item.description:
@Mikeyzzz wrote:

[quote=“sk8rdude461, post:4, topic:472919”][quote author=Mikeyzzz link=topic=590776.msg4179855#msg4179855 date=1355379310]
Well that’s really what is happening, Some players can connect to server and others receive the “Error Connecting To Client” message.
[/quote]
I didn’t know you could get an error connecting to client error when you are running the client…[/quote]
Server :o

Read full topic
